attributes.action: Make NHS dental care more accessible!
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is suffering right now especially with the cost of living crisis and not everybody can afford private dental care. Majority of practices will not accept new NHS patients at the moment and dental health is declining. 

The Government need to discuss this issue and ways to fix it! 
Please sign
attributes.background: The Government need to make more of an effort to resolve this dental crisis and pay the dentists carrying out NHS work fairly.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625518
